name: Seed Venture
description: Seed Venture is a platform for crowdfunding of startup pools, which allows issuing, crowdfunding and trading of pool tokens. SEED is its payment token It enables issuing of pool tokens, crowdfunding and trading in the related DEX. No existing platform enables ISSUING, CROWDFUNDING, and TRADING at the same time. The platform has been launched last summer and is autonomous, for we have reserved no privileges in the smart contracts.
